input_schema.description: An array of cat photos to be ranked

items.description: A cat photo with its URL and optional metadata

url.description: The URL or file path to the cat photo image

title.description: An optional title or label for the photo

photographer.description: An optional credit to the photographer

input_merge.$starlark: [photo for subarray in input for photo in subarray]

output.$starlark: [score / sum(output) if sum(output) > 0 else 1.0 / len(output) for score in output]

input_merge.$starlark: [photo for subarray in input for photo in subarray]

description: The rank-cat-photos function evaluates and ranks cat photographs based on charm, composition, technical quality, and authenticity. By analyzing genuine personality, artistic framing, technical clarity, and authentic moments, this function produces a ranked list that identifies the most exceptional cat photographs across all evaluated dimensions.

input_schema.description: An array of cat photos to be ranked

items.description: A cat photo with its URL and optional metadata

url.description: The URL or file path to the cat photo image

title.description: An optional title or label for the photo

photographer.description: An optional credit to the photographer
